reasons_to_visit.details: July offers the warmest temperatures perfect for all outdoor activities and late evening strolls.
Peak festival season with outdoor concerts, street festivals, and cultural events.
City comes alive with outdoor dining, street performers, and bustling beer gardens.
Many attractions and venues extend their hours during peak summer season.
Ideal weather for exploring the city on foot and discovering hidden gems.

reasons_to_avoid.details: July is the busiest month with overwhelming crowds at major tourist sites.
Occasional hot weather can make midday sightseeing uncomfortable.
Peak season pricing affects all aspects of travel from hotels to meals.
Popular venues and accommodations are often fully booked months in advance.
